{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
friend constexpr difference_type operator-( const /*outer-iterator*/&amp; i,

    requires ranges::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;V&gt;,

Calculates the distance (in number of chunks) between the {{rlp|/|iterator}} and [[cpp/iterator/default_sentinel_t|sentinel]].

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}.

@1@ Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
const auto dist = ranges::end(i.parent_-&gt;base_) - *i.parent_-&gt;current_;
if (dist &lt; i.parent_-&gt;remainder_)
    return dist == 0 ? 0 : 1;
return /*div-ceil*/(dist - i.parent_-&gt;remainder_, i.parent_-&gt;n_) + 1;
}}

@2@ Equivalent to: {{c|1=return -(s - i);}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::chunk_view::''outer-iterator''}}|plural=yes}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|the {{rlp|/|iterator}}}}
{{par|s|the sentinel}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The distance between given iterator and sentinel.
